mema wishesha karaka sabhawa hamuwe peni sitima sandaha agawinisuruwariya perawaru 10.05ta pamana mahajana piwisumen piwisi athara, shirani bandaranayaka mahathmiya anka 01 darana kamitu shalawe di raswu wishesha karaka sabhawa hamuwe paya ekahamaraka pamana kalayak peni sitiyaya.agawinisuruwariyata erehiwa idiripathwa athi chodana sambandhayen withthi wachika idiripath kirimata sathiyaka kalayak karaka sabhawa wisin bandaranayaka mahathmiyata labadi athayi parlimenthu aaranch marga sandahan karayi.perawaru 10.30 pamana kamituwa raswana thek katimu shalawa aasannaye agawinisuruwariya asungena sitiyaya.paswaru 1.10ta pamana karaka sabha awasthawa nimawi agawinisuruwariya parlimenthuwen pitawa giyaya.nilakandan nithignya samagame janadhipathi nithignya romesh da silwa, janadhipathi nithignya nalin ladduwahetti, nithignya saliya piris, nithignya sugath kaldera, nithignya eranda silwa, nithignya riyad amin saha nithignya kathdayiya nilakandan mahathwaru agawinisuruwariya wenuwen peni sitimata pamina sitiyaha..
